markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 252 4.0 You are adept at living in the wilderness, foraging for food and building shelter, and with training you discover the secrets of tracking and hiding your trail. Even if you’re untrained, you can still use Survival to Subsist. Survival Untrained General Actions - [Subsist](/Skills.aspx?ID=6&General=true) in the wild by foraging for food and building shelter. Item Bonuses for Survival
Item Bonus Level Category Consumable Note
[Triangular Teeth](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2221) +1 2 [Tattoos](/equipment/tattoos) No Survival checks to navigate bodies of water
[Compass (Lensatic)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16) +1 3 [Adventuring Gear](/equipment/adventuring-gear) No Checks to Sense Direction or navigate
[Survey Map](/Equipment.aspx?ID=65) +1 3 [Adventuring Gear](/equipment/adventuring-gear) No Survival checks, provided the checks are related to the location detailed on the map
[Survey Map (Atlas)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=65) +1 3 [Adventuring Gear](/equipment/adventuring-gear) No Survival checks, provided the checks are related to the location detailed on the map
[Coyote Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=426) +1 3 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Vestige Lenses](/Equipment.aspx?ID=767) +1 3 [Alchemical Other](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-other) No Survival checks to Track a creature marked with the incense
[Hoax-Hunter's Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1616) +1 3 [Adventuring Gear](/equipment/adventuring-gear) No Track a creature you are studying
[Hunter's Arrowhead](/Equipment.aspx?ID=483) +1 4 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No Survival checks against any creature you've currently designated as your prey for Hunt Prey
[Hunter's Arrowhead](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2343) +1 4 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Staff of Providence](/Equipment.aspx?ID=750) +1 6 [Staves](/equipment/staves) No Survival checks to Sense Direction or Subsist
[Staff of Providence (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=750) +1 10 [Staves](/equipment/staves) No Survival checks to Sense Direction or Subsist
[Staff of Providence (Major)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=750) +1 14 [Staves](/equipment/staves) No Survival checks to Sense Direction or Subsist
[Staff of Providence (True)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=750) +1 20 [Staves](/equipment/staves) No Survival checks to Sense Direction or Subsist
[Serene Mutagen (Lesser)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=100) +1 1 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Bloodhound Mask (Lesser)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=694) +1 2 [Alchemical Tools](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-tools) Yes Survival checks to track a creature by its scent
[Aromatic Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1188) +1 2 [Alchemical Ammunition](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-ammunition) Yes Track the affected creature as long as it has the odor
[Tracker's Stew](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1933) +1 3 [Alchemical Food](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-food) Yes Survival checks to Cover Tracks and Tracks
[Coyote Cloak (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=426) +2 9 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No
[Magnetite Scope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1213) +2 9 [Scopes](/equipment/customizations/scopes) No Survival checks to Sense Direction when using the scope to assist you in navigating
[The Owl](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2512) +2 20 [The Deck of Destiny](/equipment/artifacts/the-deck-of-destiny) No Survival checks to Subsist in the wild (+3 at 17th level).
[Serene Mutagen (Moderate)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=100) +2 3 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Bloodhound Mask (Moderate)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=694) +2 6 [Alchemical Tools](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-tools) Yes Survival checks to track a creature by its scent
[Magnetite Scope (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1213) +3 17 [Scopes](/equipment/customizations/scopes) No Survival checks to Sense Direction when using the scope to assist you in navigating
[Grolna](/Equipment.aspx?ID=807) +3 1 [Drugs](/equipment/alchemical-items/drugs) Yes Survival checks to follow tracks
[Bloodhound Mask (Moderate)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=694) +3 6 [Alchemical Tools](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-tools) Yes Survival checks to track a creature by its scent
[Serene Mutagen (Greater)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=100) +3 11 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
[Serene Mutagen (Major)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=100) +4 17 [Alchemical Elixirs](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-elixirs) Yes
Related Feats To see a list of Feats related to Survival, [click here](/feats?include-traits=skill&exclude-traits=archetype&include-skills=survival&sort=level-asc%3Bname-asc). Survival Untrained Actions Survival Trained Actions
